name: Dot Debugger
description:
BUGS! ERRORS! SYSTEM SHUTDOWN!

Dot the Debugger is here to save the supercomputer from the bug invasion.

Stand next to walls to hide from the bugs.
Use debugging tools to destroy them.

Defeat the bugs, save the computer, save the Earth.

+ 12 Levels
+ 10 Enemy Types
+ 2 Bosses
+ Binary Camouflage System
+ Freeware
+ Small Download (18 MB)
+ Controller Support
